environment.label: Environment
environment.description: The environment in which your Minecraft server will operate in.

config.label: Config
config.description: The various additions and modifications that can be made to your start script.

operatingSystem.label: Operating System
operatingSystem.description: The operating system that the server runs on.

fileName.label: File Name
fileName.description: The name of the file that will be used to start your server.

flags.label: Flags
flags.description: The collection of start arguments that typically optimize the server's performance.

none.label: None
none.description: A blank slate for your server.

aikars.label: Aikar's Flags
aikars.description: The classic reliable flags for boosting your server's performance.

proxy.label: Proxy
proxy.description: Generic performance flags for most proxy server software.

extraFlags.label: Extra Flags
extraFlags.description: Additional flags that may improve performance or change functionality.

vectors.label: Modern Vectors
vectors.description: Enables SIMD operations to optimize map item rendering on Pufferfish and its forks.

memory.label: Memory
memory.description: The amount of memory (RAM) to allocate to your server.

warning.low: It's recommended to increase the amount of memory allocated to the server.
warning.high: It's recommended to decrease the amount of memory allocated to the server.

gui.label: Use GUI
gui.description: Whether to display the built-in server management GUI.

autoRestart.label: Auto-restart
autoRestart.description: Whether to automatically restart after it is stopped.

variables.label: Use Variables
variables.description: Whether to use environment variables within the script to define memory, file name, and other commonly changed elements.

script.label: Script
script.description: The resulting script that can be used to start your server. Place this file in the same location as {{fileName}}, then execute it!
